verses.name: Jeremiah 9:24
verses.text: But let him that glorieth glory in this, that he understandeth and knoweth me, that I am the Lord which exercise lovingkindness, judgment, and righteousness, in the earth: for in these things I delight, saith the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 9:25
verses.text: Behold, the days come, saith the Lord, that I will punish all them which are circumcised with the uncircumcised;

verses.name: Jeremiah 9:26
verses.text: Egypt, and Judah, and Edom, and the children of Ammon, and Moab, and all that are in the utmost corners, that dwell in the wilderness: for all these nations are uncircumcised, and all the house of Israel are uncircumcised in the heart.
